title: Spooky Jam 2025
description:
Spooky Jam 2025!  A special Halloween game jam for the STLGameDev community!

https://stlgame.dev/news/spooky-jam-2025/

title: Spooky Jam Work-Up (Meramec Valley)
description:
Free work-up session for the Spooky Jam 2025!

Bring your laptop to work on your game in person with other Jammers!

This event is at the Meramec Valley branch Meeting Room
https://www.slcl.org/hours-and-locations/meramec-valley-branch
location: St. Louis County Library–Meramec Valley Branch, 1501 San Simeon Way, Fenton, MO 63026, USA

title: Game Audio Club: Music Show & Tell!
description:
If you’re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesn’t matter if you’re a pro or just starting out— everyone’s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio. We’re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311288271
location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us

title: Spooky Jam Work-Up (Grant's View)
description:
Free work-up session for the Spooky Jam 2025!

Bring your laptop to work on your game in person with other Jammers!

This event is at the Grant's View branch - Meeting Room 1
https://www.slcl.org/hours-and-locations/grants-view-branch
location: St. Louis County Library - Grant's View Branch, 9700 Musick Ave, St. Louis, MO 63123, USA

title: Game Club: Squirrel Stapler/Dread X Collection 2
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design. This month we are playing a whole collection of spooky horror games... Squirrel Stapler and the Dread X Collection 2!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311115814
location: Qdoba (Creve Coeur) - 766 N New Ballas Rd - Creve Coeur, MO, us

description:

https://www.slcl.org/hours-and-locations/grand-glaize-branch
location: St. Louis County Library–Grand Glaize Branch, 1010 Meramec Station Road, Manchester, MO 63021, USA

title: Spooky Jam 2025 Showcase Event
description:
Bring your finished game to show-off and hangout with other Jammers in the Post-Jam Showcase event!

Costumes Encouraged!
location: Maryville University - Design & Visual Art Building, Room 103/104 - 611 Maryville University Dr, St. Louis, MO 63141, USA

title: Share & Play: Game Showcase/Playtesting!
description:
Join us for casual game playtesting! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback.

We will be in the Creative Lab upstairs on the second floor!

We encourage everyone to bring game projects that you are working on or recently finished to show off! Game jam games, video games, physical games, student projects, and everything in between!

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/311042464
location: St. Louis County Library - Clark Family branch - 1640 South Lindbergh Blvd - St. Louis, MO, us
